data.description: Are you ready to turn your classroom knowledge into real-world experience?Do you enjoy collaborating with others and working as part of a team? If so, the Federal Home Loan Bank of Indianapolis (FHLBank) invites you to apply for our 2026 Summer Internship Program!We’re looking for well-rounded, motivated students to join us for a 10-week paid internship where you’ll gain hands-on experience, build your professional network, and develop valuable skills in a dynamic business environment.What You’ll ExperienceAs an MPP Data Analytics Intern at FHLBank, you’ll:Design and build interactive Power BI reports and dashboards to deliver insights to internal stakeholdersClean, transform, and analyze large datasets from sources such as SQL, Oracle, and Dynamics 365Collaborate with team members and business units to gather requirements and deliver impactful visualizationsPerform data validation and troubleshoot existing reportsDocument processes and contribute to dashboard design and data governance best practicesDevelop technical skills in SQL and Power BIApply strong problem-solving and communication skills to collaborate across teams and present analytical results effectivelyContribute to meaningful projects that align with your field of studyGain exposure to the finance and banking industryParticipate in team-building activities, a group project, a community service event, and professional development sessions (including dining etiquette!)Who We’re Looking ForWe’re seeking students who:Have completed at least their sophomore year of undergraduate studies. Graduate students are encouraged to apply!Are majoring in Business Administration, Management Information Systems, Data Analytics, Computer Science, or related fieldsBasic experience or coursework with Power BI or other data visualization tools, including DAX and Power QueryFamiliarity with Microsoft Excel and Microsoft AccessExperience with SQL, Microsoft Azure, and Fabric is a plusCommunicate effectively, both in writing and verballyWork well independently and in team settingsAre detail-oriented, organized, and eager to solve problemsProgram Highlights10-week paid internship: Monday, June 1 to Friday, August 7Flexible hybrid workforce model: Onsite three days a week and two days remote.Competitive hourly rate“Dress for your day” dress code: You choose the appropriate work attire based on what your day looks like.Professional development and networking opportunitiesInclusive and collaborative work environmentReady to apply? Submit your resume and cover letter. We look forward to learning more about you!The Federal Home Loan Bank of Indianapolis is an Equal Opportunity Employer.
requirements: Collaborate with team members and business units to gather requirements and deliver impactful visualizations
Have completed at least their sophomore year of undergraduate studies. Graduate students are encouraged to apply!
responsibilities: Develop technical skills in SQL and Power BI
Apply strong problem-solving and communication skills to collaborate across teams and present analytical results effectively
Participate in team-building activities, a group project, a community service event, and professional development sessions (including dining etiquette!)
